title: SpongeBob - Sponge on the Run v 1.01 IOS.ipa
description:
Play the brand-new SpongeBob: Sponge on the Run based on the new SpongeBob Movie: Sponge out of Water!

SpongeBob and Plankton are in a race to find the lost Krabby Patty formula somewhere in Bikini Bottom, Apocalyptic Bikini Bottom and a real-world beach. When heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s not running, SpongeBob is flying, floating in a bubble, or has Plankton jumping around his surreal imagination. And when the running gets tough, the tough get heroic! SpongeBob becomes Super SpongeBob to knock through any obstacle in his way!

EXPERIENCE BIKINI BOTTOM

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Run through iconic locations including Bikini Bottom, Apocalyptic Bikini Bottom and out of water on a beach
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Customize SpongeBob with unique costumes
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Plankton helps SpongeBob with power-ups like shields and magnets
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Become Super SpongeBob and knock everything out of SpongeBobÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s path!

UNEXPECTED TWISTS

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Adventure off the beaten path:
Ã¢â€ â€™ Float SpongeBob in a bubble through a coral forest

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Run farther than your friends! Compare distance and scores after your run
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Custom animation and voice-overs with SpongeBob and Plankton created just for this game!

SpongeBob: Sponge on the Run was developed by Playside Studios in Australia, creators of the Worldwide EditorÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Choice 'Catch the ArkÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ and the recently released Boulder Jack.

The SpongeBob: Sponge Out of Water movie will be in theaters on February 6th.

***Minimum requirements are: iPhone 4S and above, iPad 3 and above, iPod Touch (5G). This game is NOT supported on earlier generations.***
